title: [1508522766] Crepe Erase Body Treatment
description: Crepe Erase™ is a breakthrough body treatment, unlike anything you have tried before, specifically formulated to target crepey, dull, sagging skin to help visibly treat and prevent crepe skin in all of the areas that give away your age like your arms, cleavage, chest, neck, legs and even your hands.. Join Jane Seymour as the host of the infomercial and meet everyday women, including Dorothy Hamill, who’s lives and skin have been completely transformed thanks to Crepe Erase.
